ghost

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, Waka

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Defined basic functionality for a entity (any object that moves on the screen). Extended by Waka and Ghost

      • changeDirection

        public void changeDirection(Direction d)
        Attempts to change the waka's direction. If the waka is properly aligned (fully contained in one cell), then the direction is changes. Otherwise, the request is saved in the nextDirection attribute.
        Parameters:
        d -

      • moveForwards

        public void moveForwards()
        Moves the entity forward by one (speed) unit, int the correct direction based on the wakas current direction.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(Direction d)
        Retrieves the cell in front of the entity (the next cell it would enter), and checks if the entity is able to move through it i.e. whether is is a wall.
        Parameters:
        d -
        Returns:
        boolean
